title: Studio Apartment -- 7616 S. South Shore Dr.
posting_body: The Doral Apartments on South Shore Drive-7616 S. South Shore Drive is a  five story brick elevated building.
This great South Shore neighborhood location is within walking distance to Lake Michigan and nearby public transportation.
In Addition, it has a gated parking lot with assigned spots available for lesee monthly rental.
Newly decorated apartments includes stove, refrigerator, A/C,  blinds, FREE HEAT, and FREE COOKING GAS.
$40 Application Fee.          $350 Move-In Fee after application is approved - (no security deposit.)
If you would like to set up an appointment please call:
Hours:  Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m
You can also check us out on Facebook, our website <URL>, or Twitter (@KalabichMgmt).
